data.name: Novilar Nightmode
data.description: A darker theme for Novilar. Only available in Alligator flavour, until further notice. -To report any issues please see the forum thread

data.name: Novilar Compact Mode
data.description: Reduces whitespace and header images for a less scroll-heavy Novilar experience. This style is a work in progress and will be improved up as time goes on. -To report any issues please see the forum thread

Just wanted to make a nice dark theme for twitch chat.

Enjoy

data.name: Github Dark Wide Transparent
data.description:
A wide GitHub theme with transparent panes revealing a background wallpaper image.

If you like this style, please help others find it by giving it the thumbs up in UserStyles.org.

*** This is currently a work-in-progress (re-write) - Hopefully I'll be making daily updates to cover anything I've missed so be patient while I find them all. :-)

data.name: Flight Rising: No Signatures
data.description: A simple style that removes signatures and broadcast messages in the forums of Flight Rising.
